Reviews.Title: SANYO OEM SCP-26LBPS PINK BATTERY KATANA II 6650
Reviews.Author: S. Ward "1sancho"
Reviews.Content: Great purchase - if you need a battery for this type phone - do not hesitate to purchase! Great price - and works perfectly - had a few weeks now - no problems! Also - FAST delivery!

Reviews.Title: It IS the original color...
Reviews.Author: Decorating Queen
Reviews.Content: This is exactly the same color as my original battery.  Works fine, as expected, since it is made by Sanyo.

Reviews.Title: Rapid Processing
Reviews.Author: ROBERT J SCHUDER
Reviews.Content: Enjoyed the easy of ordering very fast response. Fit my needs at a crucial time when battry power was dwindling.

Reviews.Title: Great Replacement!
Reviews.Author: David M. Todd
Reviews.Content: Bought this battery as a replacement for a Sanyo Katana II.  Very happy so far.  Battery came charged and fits perfectly!  Thinking about buying another at this price.

Reviews.Title: Very satisfied
Reviews.Author: Manchester
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent quality battery that holds its charge during talk and standby as well as the original that came with the phone.
